Package com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.service

Class MailService

java.lang.Object
com.ilm.projecto_ilm_backend.service.MailService
@Path("/mail") public class MailService extends Object
Service class for handling mail-related operations.

  • Method Details

    • getReceivedMessages

      @GET @Path("/received") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getReceivedMessages(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, @QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("1") int page, @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("10") int pageSize, @QueryParam("unread") @DefaultValue("false") boolean unread) throws UnknownHostException
      Retrieves received messages for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      pageSize - The number of messages per page.
      unread - If true, only unread messages are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A response containing the received messages and the total number of messages.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.

    • getSentMessages

      @GET @Path("/sent") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getSentMessages(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, @QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("1") int page, @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("10") int pageSize) throws UnknownHostException
      Retrieves sent messages for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      pageSize - The number of messages per page.
      Returns:
      A response containing the sent messages and the total number of messages.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.

    • markMailAsSeen

      @PUT @Path("/seen/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response markMailAsSeen(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, @PathParam("id") int mailId) throws UnknownHostException
      Marks a specific mail as seen for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      mailId - The ID of the mail to be marked as seen.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the result of the operation.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.

    • markMailAsDeleted

      @PUT @Path("/deleted/{id}") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response markMailAsDeleted(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, @PathParam("id") int mailId) throws UnknownHostException
      Marks a specific mail as deleted for the user identified by the session ID.

    • sendMail

      @POST @Path("/send") @Consumes("application/json") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response sendMail(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, MailDto mailDto) throws UnknownHostException
      Sends a mail for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      mailDto - The details of the mail to be sent.
      Returns:
      A response indicating the result of the operation.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.

    • getContacts

      @GET @Path("/contacts") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getContacts(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId) throws UnknownHostException
      Retrieves the contacts for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A response containing the list of contacts.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.

    • getUnreadNumber

      @GET @Path("/unreadNumber") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response getUnreadNumber(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId) throws UnknownHostException

    • searchMails

      @GET @Path("/search") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response searchMails(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, @QueryParam("query") String query, @QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("1") int page, @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("10") int pageSize, @QueryParam("unread") @DefaultValue("false") boolean unread) throws UnknownHostException
      Searches for received mails based on a query for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      query - The search query.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      pageSize - The number of messages per page.
      unread - If true, only unread messages are retrieved.
      Returns:
      A response containing the search results and the total number of results.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.

    • searchSentMails

      @GET @Path("/searchSent") @Produces("application/json") public jakarta.ws.rs.core.Response searchSentMails(@CookieParam("session-id") String sessionId, @QueryParam("query") String query, @QueryParam("page") @DefaultValue("1") int page, @QueryParam("pageSize") @DefaultValue("10") int pageSize) throws UnknownHostException
      Searches for sent mails based on a query for the user identified by the session ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - The session ID of the user.
      query - The search query.
      page - The page number to retrieve.
      pageSize - The number of messages per page.
      Returns:
      A response containing the search results and the total number of results.
      Throws:
      UnknownHostException - If the client's IP address cannot be determined.
